title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounting, Business Management, Government and Geography.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) other subjects.

For NBC holders, the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Office Practice and Secretarial Duties.?
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus any Social Science subject.

title: ACTUARIAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Economics and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and Economics plus any other two (2)            relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one (1) other subject.

title: ADULT EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level   passes.

(ii)           NCE merit in two (2) subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and three (3) of Literature in English, History, French, Yoruba, Igbo, Hausa, Christian Religious Studies, Islamic Studies, Geography/Physic, Economics and Government or TC II with pass in English Language and four (4) other subjects.
subjects: Government/History, one (1) Social Science subject and any other subject.

title: AGRIC-ECONOMICS AND EXTENSION:
de_requirements:
1. Passes at the Advanced level in GCE, IJMB or an approved equivalent examination in two or three of Chemistry and Botany/Zoology. In addition, candidates must also meet the five (5) credit passes in WASCE/NECO/GCE/NABTEB requirements as in UTME.

2. Holders of the following qualifications from institutions recognized by the University of Jos may also be considered for admission into 200 level. Higher National Diploma (HND) in Agriculture, Forestry, Animal Health and Production and other relevant qualifications with at least an Upper Credit. Candidates must also meet the ‘O’ Level requirements for UTME.
utme_requirements:
Credit passes in five (5) WASSCE/GCE (‘O’ levels/NABTEB)

Subjects and its equivalent as approved by the University Senate, including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry Biology or Agricultural Science and Physics. The credit pass in Agricultural Science must be backed up with at least a pass in Biology. In addition, candidates must have UTME scores high enough for the cut-off point set for the year in which the applications are being considered.
subjects:
Five SSCE Credit passes to include:

English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any one of the following:

Physics, Geography or Economics

title: AGRICULTURE
de_requirements:
1. Passes at the Advanced level in GCE, IJMB or an approved equivalent examination in two or three of Chemistry and Botany/Zoology. In addition, candidates must also meet the five (5) credit passes in WASCE/NECO/GCE/NABTEB requirements as in UTME.

2. Holders of the following qualifications from institutions recognized by the University of Jos may also be considered for admission into 200 level. Higher National Diploma (HND) in Agriculture, Forestry, Animal Health and Production and other relevant qualifications with at least an Upper Credit. Candidates must also meet the ‘O’ Level requirements for UTME.
utme_requirements:
Five SSCE Credit passes to include:

English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any one of the following:

Physics, Geography or Economics
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and any one of Physics or Mathematics.

title: ANATOMY
de_requirements: The requirements as in Dentistry and Medicine & Surgery and must have passed the first Professional Examination for Dentistry and second Professional Examination for Medicine & Surgery
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level/SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: ANIMAL PRODUCTION
de_requirements:
1. Passes at the Advanced level in GCE, IJMB or an approved equivalent examination in two or three of Chemistry and Botany/Zoology. In addition, candidates must also meet the five (5) credit passes in WASCE/NECO/GCE/NABTEB requirements as in UTME.

2. Holders of the following qualifications from institutions recognized by the University of Jos may also be considered for admission into 200 level. Higher National Diploma (HND) in Agriculture, Forestry, Animal Health and Production and other relevant qualifications with at least an Upper Credit. Candidates must also meet the ‘O’ Level requirements for UTME
utme_requirements:
Credit passes in five (5) WASSCE/GCE (‘O’ levels/NABTEB)

Subjects and its equivalent as approved by the University Senate, including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry Biology or Agricultural Science and Physics. The credit pass in Agricultural Science must be backed up with at least a pass in Biology. In addition, candidates must have UTME scores high enough for the cut-off point set for the year in which the applications are being considered.
subjects:
Five SSCE Credit passes to include:

English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any one of the following:

Physics, Geography or Economics

title: ARABIC STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arabic and any other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Arabic and three (3) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts and/or Social Sciences.

title: ARCHAEOLOGY
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Arts or Social Sciences and Sciences.

JOS accepts NCE (Merit) or ND (Lower credit).
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSCE to include English Language and Mathematics.
subjects:
Any two (2) subjects from Arts, Social Science and Sciences.

Jos requires five (5) credit passes in any Arts, Social Sciences, and Sciences but must include English Language, and Mathematics.

title: ARCHITECTURE
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

ND/HND upper credits in relevant field.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: BANKING & FINANCE
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Accounting, Economics, Management, Mathematics, Geography and Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include: English Language, Mathematics and any other subjects. For NBC, the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of the following; Accounting, Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Office Practice and Economics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics, plus any one (1) of Government and Geography.

title: BIOCHEMISTRY
de_requirements: Two ‘A’ level or IJMB passes in Chemistry and any one of Physics, Biology/Zoology/Botany and Mathematics plus ‘O’ Level/SSCE pass at Credit Level in English Language, Mathematics, Biology Chemistry and Physics at not more than two (2) sittings.
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level/SSCE pass at credit level in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: BUILDING
de_requirements:
‘A’ level passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

(i) JOS accepts ND/HND in Building  or Civil Engineering  and Quantity Surveying with a minimum of Lower Credit with passes at ‘O’ Levels in Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, English Language, and any of Economics, Additional/Further Mathematics, Geography, Building Construction, Biology and Technical Drawing in SSCE, NECO, NABTEB or Equivalent
utme_requirements:
Five SSCE credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Physics, Chemistry and any one of Geography, Economics, Fine Arts and Technical drawing. For holders of NTC, the other relevant subjects could be Intro. to Building Construction, Bricklaying, Concreting, Walls, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Building/Engineering Drawing, Joinery, Carpentry, Gas, Steal Work and Bronze Welding, Cold and Hot Water Supply,  sanitation & Drainage.

JOS accepts Holders of HSC, GCE 'A' level passes and a minimum of two sittings in Mathematics and either Physics or Chemistry or both PLUS passes with credit in at least four subjects at 'O' levels from the following: Building, Construction, Land Surveying, Fine Arts, Technical Drawing, Economics, Additional Mathematics, Geography  & including English Language.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

title: BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounts, Business Management, Government, Geography or Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics, plus any two (2) of Accounting, Business Methods, Commerce, Government, Geography, and Statistics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one (1) other subject.

title: CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or Biology.

 

(ii)   ND/NCE with good grades in relevant 'O' Level subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes/NCE to include CRS/Religious Studies.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, CRS and three (3) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Two (2) Arts subjects including CRS and any other subject.

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)	'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.
(ii)	ND/HND upper credit at appropriate levels.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and one Science subject
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography.

title: CRIMINOLOGY & SECURITY STUDIES
de_requirements:
i. Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.

ii. ND in Law, Criminal Justice, Public Administration with passes at lower credit or higher grade.
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes to include English Language.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects

title: CRIMINOLOGY AND SECURITY STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Economics and any one of Mathematics, Statistics, Geography, Physics, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Accounting, Business Management, History and Government.
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) of Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any of Government, History, Geography, Literature in English, French and Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.

title: CROP   PRODUCTION
de_requirements:
1. Passes at the Advanced level in GCE, IJMB or an approved equivalent examination in two or three of Chemistry and Botany/Zoology. In addition, candidates must also meet the five (5) credit passes in WASCE/NECO/GCE/NABTEB requirements as in UTME.

2. Holders of the following qualifications from institutions recognized by the University of Jos may also be considered for admission into 200 level. Higher National Diploma (HND) in Agriculture, Forestry, Animal Health and Production and other relevant qualifications with at least an Upper Credit. Candidates must also meet the ‘O’ Level requirements for UTME
utme_requirements:
Credit passes in five (5) WASSCE/GCE (‘O’ levels/NABTEB)

Subjects and its equivalent as approved by the University Senate, including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry Biology or Agricultural Science and Physics. The credit pass in Agricultural Science must be backed up with at least a pass in Biology. In addition, candidates must have UTME scores high enough for the cut-off point set for the year in which the applications are being considered.
subjects:
Five SSCE Credit passes to include:

English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any one of the following:

Physics, Geography or Economics

title: DENTAL SURGERY
de_requirements:
i) Three (3) ‘A’ level or IJMB passes to include Physics, Chemistry,  Biology plus ‘O’ level/SSCE pass at Credit level in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

ii) First Degree Holders of University of Jos or any other University approved by Senate in Biological Sciences and Bio- Medical-based courses plus ‘O’Level/SSCE requirements as in (i) above.
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ Level/SSCE pass at credit Level in English language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and Physics.

title: EARLY CHILDHOOD EDUCATION
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
Two ‘A’ level passes in Economics and any one of Mathematics, Statistics, Geography, Physics, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Accounting, Business Management, History and Government.

JOS does not require a credit pass in History and does not accept ND, HND and NCE as entry requirements.
utme_requirements: Five SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two of Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any of Government, History, Geography, Literature in English, French and CRK/IRK. JOS Mathematics is compulsory.

title: EDUCATION & BIOLOGY
de_requirements: NCE/’A’ level passes in Biology and one other Science subject e.g. Chemistry, Physics, Agriculture, Integrated science.
utme_requirements: Five SSCE or NECO at Credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and other subjects from Physics, Agriculture.
subjects: Biology and two other subjects from Chemistry, Physics and Agriculture.

title: EDUCATION & CHEMISTRY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level/NCE passes including Chemistry and one (1) other Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits in Mathematics, Chemistry, English Language and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Agricultural Science.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) other subjects chosen from Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: EDUCATION & ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
i) Candidates should pass Two (2) ‘A’ level subjects passes, merit or credit, others include relevant Diploma programme with Economics compulsory (provided the O/level requirements are satisfied).

ii) Passes in two (2) subjects at IJMB interim (Joint Matriculation Board) examination including five (5) credits level passes at SSCE, WAEC, NECO or NABTEB.

Iii) Candidates must pass NCE or have its equivalent like (2) relevant passes at Advanced level and three (3) ordinary level relevant subjects (Grade II, G.C.E,

 O/level SSCE).          

Note: No waiver for candidates who have pass in Mathematics or English.
utme_requirements: Five SSCE, NECO or its equivalent at credit level in the Social Science subjects but English Language, Economics and Mathematics compulsory.
subjects: English Language/Mathematics and any two (2) core subjects from either Economics, Commerce, Geography and the Social Science and its equivalent. However, English Language and Mathematics are compulsory.

title: EDUCATION & ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements:
i. NCE Diploma in Education

ii. Pass in relevant subjects at Distinction, credit or merit levels in or have its equivalent like two relevant passes at Advanced level and five ordinary level relevant subjects (Grade II TC, GCE O/L, and SSCE).
utme_requirements:
i. Credit in English Language

ii. Credit in Literature in English

iii. Credit in Mathematics

iv. Credit in two other Arts subjects at SSCE level.
subjects: Literature in English and one Arts and any other subjects

title: EDUCATION & FRENCH
de_requirements:
i. NCE or Diploma in Education

ii. Diplome d’etudes de la langue Francaise (DELF B1)

iii. A minimum of merit is acceptable at the NCE or Diploma in Education Level.
utme_requirements:
i. Credit in English Language

ii. Credit in Mathematics

iii. Credit in French Language/(DELF A2) Diplome d’etudes de la langue Francaise.

iv. Credit in two other Arts subjects at SSCE level
subjects: French Plus two other Arts Subjects.

title: EDUCATION & GEOGRAPHY/PHYSICS
de_requirements: Two ‘A’ level passes/NCE merit level in Sciences/Social Sciences which should include Geography.
utme_requirements: Five SSCE Credit passes in Sciences/Social Sciences to include Geography, English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Geography plus two other Sciences/Social Sciences

title: EDUCATION & HISTORY
de_requirements:
i. NCE or Diploma in Education

ii. A minimum of merit is acceptable at the NCE or Diploma in Education Level.

iii. A candidate must have a minimum of five credits at ‘O’ level including English Language, Mathematics, History or Government and other subjects which are relevant to the course of study
utme_requirements:
i.  Credit in English Language

ii. Credit in Mathematics

iii. Credit in History or Government

A total of five credits at SSCE level including English Language, Mathematics, 

History or Govet
subjects: History and any other two subjects chosen from CRK, Islamic Studies, Lit. in English, French, Yoruba, Geography/Physics, Economics, Government  and Hausa.

title: EDUCATION & MATHEMATICS
de_requirements: Two ‘A’ level/NCE credit in Mathematics a plus one other science subject.
utme_requirements: Five SSCE credit passes including Mathematics and English Language plus one other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics and Physics plus Biology and Chemistry.

title: EDUCATION & PHYSICS
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.

(ii) NCE credit/merit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credits passes to include English Language, Physics, Mathematics and two (2) other Science subjects or NTC/NBC.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics or Chemistry plus one (1) other subjects.

title: EDUCATION & RELIGIOUS STUDIES
de_requirements:
1)   NCE or Diploma in Education

2) A minimum of merit is   acceptable at the NCE or  n    Diploma in Education Level

3) A candidate must have a minimum of five credits at ‘O’ Level including English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies and other relevant Arts and Social Science subject.
utme_requirements:
i. Credit in English Language

ii. Credit in Mathematics

iii. Credit in Christian Religious Studies

iv. A total of five credits at SSCE level including English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies and other relevant Arts and Social Science subjects
subjects: Two Arts subject including Religious studies and one other subject.

title: EDUCATION & SOCIAL STUDIES
de_requirements:
(i) NCE Social Studies from recognized Colleges.

(ii)           Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language plus two (2) Arts /Social Science subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) of Christian Religious Studies, Economics, Geography/Physics, Government, History and Islamic Studies.

title: EDUCATION AND INTEGRATED SCIENCE:
de_requirements:
i. NCE (integrated Science)

ii. NCE in two Science Subjects (from Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Mathematics and Agricultural Science.)

iii. NCE (Science Education).

iv. GCE ‘A’ Level passes in two Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five Credit passes in SSCE in any of the following subjects: Biology, Chemistry, English Language, Mathematics, Physics/ Agricultural Science.
subjects: Any three of Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology, Physics and Agriculture.

title: EDUCATIONAL ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2)'A' Level passes from Literature in English, History, Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies, Hausa, Yoruba and Igbo with 'O' Level pass in Mathematics.

(ii)  NCE merit in the subjects listed above.

(i) Two (2)'A' Level passes from Literature in English, History, Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies, Hausa, Yoruba and Igbo with 'O' Level pass in Mathematics.
(ii)  NCE merit in the subjects listed above.
utme_requirements:
(i) Five (5)'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and Economics.

(ii)  Five (5) TC II merit including English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) of Literature In English, History, French, Geography/Physics, Economics and Mathematics.

title: EDUCATIONAL ADMINISTRATION & PLANNING
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2)'A' Level passes from Literature in English, History, Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies, Hausa, Yoruba and Igbo with 'O' Level pass in Mathematics.

(ii)  NCE merit in the subjects listed above.
utme_requirements:
(i) Five (5)'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and Economics.

(ii)  Five (5) TC II merit including English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) of Literature In English, History, French, Geography/Physics, Economics and Mathematics.

title: ELECTRICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics, Physics or Chemistry
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, English Language and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

title: ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English, English Language and three other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Mathematics, Economics, Geography, Biology and Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including Chemistry, Mathematics and English Language.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one other subject

title: FINE ART/FINE & APPLIED ARTS
de_requirements:
NCE or Diploma at Credit Level in relevant subject areas, in addition to JAMB Admission

Requirements.
utme_requirements:
‘O’ levels Credit pass in:

i. English Language

ii. Mathematics

iii. Fine Arts, Visual Arts, Painting and Decoration, Technical Drawing/Building and Engineering, Drawing Dyeing and Bleaching.

iv. Any other two subjects from the group History, Geography, Economics, Government, Christian Religious Studies and Islamic Religious Studies
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics and Fine Art/Physics

title: FRENCH
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including French and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including French and English Language plus one other Arts subject.
subjects: French and any other two (2) subjects from Arts and Social Sciences.

title: GEOGRAPHY & PLANNING
de_requirements:
Two 'A' level passes including Geography.

JOS accepts IJMB passes including Geography. Jos also accepts National or Higher National Diploma in Urban and Regional Planning or Land Surveying at Credit and above, provided candidates posses the minimum UTME requirements.
utme_requirements:
Five SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and Geography.

JOS requires  five (5) ‘O’ level passes to include English Language, 

Mathematics and Geography in addition to any Social Science or Science Subjects.

Accepts credit in Zoology, Physics, Agricultural Science and credit in English Language
subjects: Geography and any two Arts subject.

title: GEOLOGY & MINING
de_requirements: (i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Geology, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics, Biology and Geography.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, Biology and Geography.

title: GUIDANCE & COUNSELLING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes or NCE in two (2) subjects plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level NTC/NBC credit passes or TC II merit including English Language with 'O' Level pass in Mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: HISTORY & INTERNATIONAL STUDIES
de_requirements: credit) in History/ Government and any other related subject.
utme_requirements: Language, Geography, Government/History.
subjects: subjects from the Arts and Social Sciences.

title: INDUSTRIAL CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and Mathematics

(ii)   ND in Science Technology or ND in relevant programmes with the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and Biology/Agricultural Science.
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics and any of Physics/Biology/ Agricultural Science.

title: INSURANCE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounts, Business Management, Government, Geography or Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes    including          English                Language, Mathematics, Economics plus any two(2) of Accounting, Business Methods, Commerce, Government, Geography and Statistics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one (1) other subject.

title: ISLAMIC STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes to include Islamic Studies.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and Islamic Studies or Arabic and any three (3) relevant subjects.
subjects: Islamic Studies plus two (2) other Arts subjects.

title: LAW
de_requirements:
Two (2)'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.

(ii)   NCE/ND/First Degree (Second Class Lower).
utme_requirements: Five (5)'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Literature in English and Mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: LIBRARY & INFORMATION SCIENCE
de_requirements:
I) Relevant Diploma programme from recognized institutions with credit/merit level passes.

Ii) Two ‘A' level passes at credit/merit level in the relevant subject areas with SSCE/GCE ‘O’ level credit passes in three (3) other subjects.

iii) At least merit in two (2) major subjects in relevant areas in the NCE with SSCE/GCE ‘O’ Level credit passes in three (3) other subjects.
utme_requirements:
Five SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and any other three (3) subjects.

Note: Credit in ‘O’ level English Language and Mathematics are compulsory for both Direct Entry and UTME .
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.

title: LINGUISTICS
de_requirements: Two ‘A’ level passes or NCEW to include any Language, preferably an African Language, JOS HAS NO DIRECT ENTRY.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language.
subjects: Any Language and two (2) other subjects.

title: LITERATURE IN ENGLISH
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English and English Language.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: MARKETING
de_requirements:
Two ‘A’ level passes chosen from Accounting, Management, Government and Geography

Jos accepts

a. Passes at Advanced Level GCE, IJMB or an approved equivalent examination in Accounting, Business Management or Economics.

b. Holders of the following qualifications may also be considered for admission into 200 level: National Diploma (ND) in Accounting, Financial Studies, Business Administration, Banking and Finance, Insurance or any other business course with a pass at not less than Lower Credit from any recognized Institutions (Polytechnic, Technical Institutions, etc.
utme_requirements:
Five SSCE credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and any 3 relevant subjects.

Jos requires:

credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three subjects from Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Business Methods, Statistics, Government or Economics.
subjects:
Mathematics, Economics plus one other relevant Subject.

Jos requires Mathematics and any other two (2) subjects from Marketing, Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Business Methods, Statistics, Government or Economics.

title: MASS COMMUNICATION
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts and Social Science subjects.

title: MATHEMATICS
de_requirements:
) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and any other science subject.

(ii)           NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) of Physics, Chemistry or Economics
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and Physics or Chemistry.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics or Geography.

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)        Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

(ii)       ND upper credit, NCE technical and HND in Mech. Engineering.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: MEDICAL LABORATORY SCIENCE
de_requirements:
i. Three (3) ‘A’ level or IJMB passes to include Physics, Chemistry,  Biology plus ‘O’ level/SSCE pass at Credit level in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics at not more than two sittings.

 

ii. First Degree Holders of University of Jos or any other University approved by Senate in Biological Sciences and Bio- Medical-based courses plus ‘O’ Level/SSCE requirements as in (i) above.

 

iii. Medical Laboratory Technicians with evidence of registration with the Medical Laboratory Science
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology

title: MEDICINE & SURGERY
de_requirements:
i) Three (3) ‘A’ level or IJMB passes to include Physics, Chemistry,  Biology plus ‘O’ level/SSCE pass at Credit level in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

ii) First Degree Holders of University of Jos or any other University approved by Senate in Biological Sciences and Bio- Medical-based courses plus ‘O’Level/SSCE requirements as in (i) above.
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level/SSCE pass at credit level in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: MICROBIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) from Biology, Zoology or Botany.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and either Physics or Mathematics.

title: MINING ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)   'A' Level passes in any two (2) of Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

 

(ii)           ND upper credit in Mining Engineering/ Mineral  Resources and Geological Study in addition to 'O' Level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, English Language and any other Science subjects
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.

title: MUSIC
de_requirements: ‘A’ level passes to include Music, accepts University of Jos Diploma in Music Major in relevant fields such as Theatre Arts, HND II, ND II MUSIC at credit level, NCE Music Education at credit/Merit Level, LRCM, IJMB ‘A’ level Music in addition to ‘O’ level requirements.
utme_requirements: Five SSCE credit passes to include English Language. JOS requires ‘O’ level credit passes to include English Language, Literature in English and a Arts/Social Science subjects at not more than two sittings.
subjects: Music, Literature in English and two other ARTS subjects. A pass in Grade V in Theory & Practical in MUSIC of MUSON, ABRSM, one year Certificate in Music from a recognized University acceptable to the Senate of University of Jos is accepted as a credit pass is an added advantage to the candidate.

title: NURSING/NURSING SCIENCE
de_requirements:
i) Candidates who are holders of the Registered Nurse (RN) or Registered Midwife (RM) Diploma certificate of the Nursing and Midwifery Council of Nigeria plus pass at Credit Level in ‘O’ Level/SSCE in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics at not more than two (2) sittings.
ii) Three (3) ‘A’ Level or IJMB passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Biology plus ‘O’ Level/SSCE requirements as in (i) above.
iii) First Degree Holders of University of Jos or any other University approved by Senate in Biological Sciences and Bio-Medical-Based courses plus ‘O’ Level /SSE
 requirements as in (i) above.
utme_requirements: Five ‘O’ level/SSCE pass at credit level in Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology, Physics and English Language.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology

title: PHARMACY
de_requirements:
i. Jos accepts B.Sc Second Class (Hons) and above in related fields plus UTME requirements.

ii. Jos accepts for Direct Entry Candidates with ’A’ level requirements plus five ‘O’ level credits in English Language, Mathematics, Physics Chemistry and Biology.

iii. Three ‘A’ level passes in Chemistry, Biology/Zoology/Botany and Physics plus UTME requirement.

iv. Jos do not accept Mathematics for Physics.

v. Jos accepts candidates with distinction in National Diploma in Pharmacy Technician from (PCN approved) colleges, plus five ‘O’ level credits in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
utme_requirements: Five SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: PHYSICAL & HEALTH EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

 

(ii)  NCE merit in Physical Education and credit in Arithmetical process or Mathematics.

 

(iii)  Diploma in Health Education, Environmental Sanitation, Physical Education, Social work, Health Administration with overall grades of merit plus three (3) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit which should include English Language.

 

(iv) NCE in Biology, Health Education, and Integrated Science with a pass grade plus two (2) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit passes.

 

(v)    Registered Nurse plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language.
utme_requirements:
i) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes including     English Language, Biology or its equivalent.

 

ii) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes to include English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) relevant subjects.

title: PHYSICS
de_requirements: NCE/Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics or Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other Science subject from Further Mathematics and Biology or Agricultural Science.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry or Biology.

title: PLANT SCIENCE & BIOTECHNOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/Botany/Zoology and Chemistry or Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and any other Science subject.

title: PLANT SCIENCE AND BIOTECHNOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/Botany/Zoology and Chemistry or Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and any other Science subject.

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government or History.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Government or History plus two (2) other Social Science/Arts subjects.

title: PSYCHOLOGY
de_requirements: Candidates for Direct Entry admission shall possess five credits in GCE, SSCE, NECO or their equivalent, of which at least two shall be at Advanced level, provided that such passes are not counted at both levels of the examination. For emphasis, English Language, Mathematics and Biology are required at credit passes. Candidates will be accepted with a Diploma or Advanced Diploma in Applied Psychology. Candidates will be accepted with a Diploma or Advanced Diploma in Psychology. Candidates with IJMB are accepted provided they have “A” level Biology at credit level.
utme_requirements: Candidates for admission into the four year degree in Psychology should posses a Senior Secondary School Certificate or General Certificate of Education, NECO or their equivalents with at least five (5) credit passes at not more than two sittings including credit in Mathematics, English Language and Biology.
subjects: UTME subjects must include Biology and three other subjects

title: PURE & APPLIED CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or Biology.

 

(ii)   ND/NCE with good grades in relevant 'O' Level subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: QUANTITY SURVEYING
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

ND/HND upper credits in relevant field.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: RELIGIOUS STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level subjects to include Religious Studies (CRS/IRS).
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and CRS/IRS.
subjects: CRS/IRS and any other two (2) subjects.

title: SCIENCE LABORATORY TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
Two ‘A’ level passes in Biology and Chemistry or Physics.

i. Two ‘A’ level passes in Biology and Chemistry.

ii. OND/UNIJOS DIPLOMA with at least Upper Credit in SLT & Project in Biological Sciences

i. Two ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

ii. OND/UNIJOS DIPLOMA with at least Upper Credit in SLT & Project in Biological Sciences.

i. Two ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and Biology

ii. OND/UNIJOS DIPLOMA with at least Upper Credit in SLT & Project in Biological Sciences.
utme_requirements:
Five SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics,  Biology Chemistry and Physics.

JOS accepts candidates with pass at the Remedial Science Programme of the University of Jos. 


At least a pass in Technical Drawing is an advantage but not requirement
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: SOCIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government or History.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Three (3) Social Science or Arts subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.

(ii) NCE merit in Arts or Social Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language.
subjects: Any three (3) Subjects

title: STATISTICS
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include Mathematics or Statistics.

NCE credit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics and at least three (3) subjects from Physics, Statistics, Chemistry, Further Mathematics, Economics and Geography.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Economics.

title: TEACHER EDUCATION SCIENCE:
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: TECHNICAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
i. ND/HND in Engineering

- Mechanical

  (Auto/Production)

- Civil

-Electrical/Electronics

ii. Merit pass and above in NCE Technical Education

iii. Full Technology Certificate (FTC)

In addition to the above, candidate must meet UTME requirements

ND/HND/NCE in Computer Science and credit in Mathematics and English Language plus one other science subject

Merit pass and above in NCE Computer Education
utme_requirements:
Five SSCE/NECO Credit passes in relevant subjects which must include English Language and Mathematics or NTC.

Five SSCE/NECO Credit passes including Mathematics, Physics plus one other science subject
subjects:
English Language, Mathematics and any other two from Chemistry, physics, Technical Drawing or other relevant technical subjects.

Computer plus Mathematics, Physics, Biology and Chemistry.

title: THEATRE & FILM STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arts, Social Sciences or Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and Arts subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and two (2) other relevant subjects.

title: URBAN & REGIONAL PLANNING
de_requirements:
(i) Two A/L passes in Geography and Mathematics 

(ii) ND/HND (upper Credit) in Town Planning or related discipline plus UTME 

requirements are accepted

JOS accepts: 

a) Holders of National Diploma (ND) in Town Planning, Land Surveying, Building, Architecture, Estate Management, and Quantity Survey.
utme_requirements:
Five SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography, and any two of Physics, Chemistry, Economics, Government, Biology, Art, History, Social Studies and Tech Drawing. 

JOS requires two other credit passes from Physics, Chemistry, Economics, Biology, Fine Art and Technical Drawing
subjects:
Mathematics, Geography and one of Economics, Physics, Chemistry.
JOS accepts any one of Physics, Chemistry, Technical Drawing, Economics and Biology as the third subject.

title: VETERINARY MEDICINE
de_requirements: A' level passes in Chemistry, Biology/Zoology, Physics or Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' level credit passes to include English Language, Biology, Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry           and Biology.

title: ZOOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE in Biology, Zoology or Botany and one other Science subject
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology and two (2) other Science subject.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
